briefdescription.para: The PairwiseDelayer module is designed to delay packets based on pairwise configurations.

detaileddescription.para: This module works by accepting packets and applying a delay according to the specified delayConfig. This can be particularly useful in scenarios where varying delays are required for different packet pairs or flows. It's an extension of PacketDelayerBase and adheres to the IPacketDelayer contract. Users can provide custom delay configurations using the delayConfig XML parameter.
